page.title: 02Community Spirit in Insch.
page.content: During Christian Aid Week a sponsored walk up Oxen Craig by 300 people raised over Â£700.Shortly after that a "Hungry Sunday Lunch", where each contributor donated the cost of a meal,raised Â£190. And just as "Gala Week" was beginning the Senior Youth Club held a "Line of Pennies" fund raising effort, which realised Â£73.This money will be used to pay the expenses of their trip to Edinburgh. The first event of the Gala was the Sheep Dog Trials.The sheep,known as hoggs,were in groups of three and the dogs were hardly fit to control them.A few competitors eventually managed to pen the sheep! The same day,Sunday,saw an "It's a Knockout" competition between local teams.This proved to be great fun aided by a sunny afternoon.
